[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@remirror/core-extensions](./core-extensions.md) &gt; [HistoryExtensionOptions](./core-extensions.historyextensionoptions.md)

## HistoryExtensionOptions interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface HistoryExtensionOptions extends BaseExtensionOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [depth](./core-extensions.historyextensionoptions.depth.md) | <code>number &#124; null</code> | The amount of history events that are collected before the oldest events are discarded. |
|  [newGroupDelay](./core-extensions.historyextensionoptions.newgroupdelay.md) | <code>number &#124; null</code> | The delay (ms) between changes after which a new group should be started. Note that when changes aren't adjacent, a new group is always started. |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getDispatch()](./core-extensions.historyextensionoptions.getdispatch.md) | This is only needed when the extension is part of a child editor, e.g. <code>ImageCaptionEditor</code>. By passing in the <code>getDispatch</code> method history actions can be dispatched into the parent editor allowing them to propagate into the child editor. |
|  [getState()](./core-extensions.historyextensionoptions.getstate.md) | This is only needed when the extension is part of a child editor, e.g. <code>ImageCaptionEditor</code>. By passing in the <code>getState</code> method history actions can be dispatched into the parent editor allowing them to propagate into the child editor |
